channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Safari Romance
channel.desc: While working on a wildlife reserve in Africa, Megan teams up with theme park designer Tim to turn the space into a safari attraction. Will their love blossom on the Savannah.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Haunted Wedding
channel.desc: The wedding between ghost hunters Jane and Brian at a haunted inn is disrupted by Angelique - a ghost who mistakes Brian for her own dead fianc?.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Attraction Test
channel.desc: After being called out during the launch of her landmark study on love, an acclaimed professor is forced to take her own dating test with the man who criticised it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Case For the Winemaker
channel.desc: When a friend's winery sees a murder, Ainsley's crime-solving skills prove invaluable as she teaches criminology and investigates the case.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sparks Over Brooklyn
channel.desc: Single chef Lidia sees her future plans fall apart when arrogant tech innovator Danny buys her restaurant and plans to completely remodel it. Can she convince him that less is more.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: 3 Bed, 2 Bath, 1 Ghost
channel.desc: New real estate agent Anna has a beautiful listing. The only problem: it has a ghost in residence who is convinced she cannot pass over until Anna gets back together with her ex.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love In The Maldives
channel.desc: A travel writer goes to the Maldives to write a piece about a legendary shipwreck. But with the help of her underwater guide, she may discover true love instead of buried treasure.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered
channel.desc: After receiving a letter in a nightclub, the Postables are whisked on a trip to find the writer hiding from a troubled past, as Oliver learns more about his father.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Priceless Love
channel.desc: After discovering that the teapot in her secondhand shop is worth thousands of dollars, Rose grabs the attention of an ambitious antique dealer.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Wedding Wish
channel.desc: When a diehard romantic sets the date for her wedding despite being single, she sets out on a quest to find a fianc?. But could true love actually be right under her nose.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Napa Ever After
channel.desc: After inheriting her grandmother's winery in Napa Valley, Cassandra takes a sabbatical to renovate the property with the help of handsome local, Alec.

channel.title: Love On Your Doorstep

channel.title: Falling In Love In Niagara
channel.desc: When her fianc? leaves her right before the wedding, Madeline goes to Niagara Falls for her honeymoon without him. Can she find new love alongside her adventurous side.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Signs Of Your Heart
channel.desc: As a single mother to her deaf son, Allie does not have much time to go out on dates. But when a handsome new tenant moves in, it looks like love has arrived at her doorstep.
